channel.title: [Added] New Organization Identified: XI-IATI-LPI
channel.description:
**Living Peace Institute is a local NGO based In Goma, Republic democratic of Congo(DRC) and would shortly be publishing to IATI. As such, a unique IATI Organisation identifier is required. The following request was reviewed by org-id.guide for most appropriate identifier.**
**Code: XI-IATI-LPI**
**Name: Living Peace Institute**
**Description: The Living Peace Institute (LPI) is a local NGO, based in Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), and organized around the goal of achieving sustainable, gender-equitable peace at all levels of society in North and South Kivu regions of Eastern DRC.
**URL: www.livingpeaceinstitute.org

item.title: [Added] New Organization Identified: XI-IATI-LPI
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The org-id.guide team reviewed the request for an identifier for Living Peace Institute, and concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.

If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added to the IATI Organisation identifier list.

Read full topic
